K3-Faker 0.2.0
A fake data generator for Kohana.

K3-Faker

What is K3-Faker?

It is a lazy-loading, locale aware Fake data module for Kohana 3.1.x.

It is inspired by (and borrows data from) Ruby's Faker gem, http://faker.rubyforge.org/, and Perl's Data::Faker, http://search.cpan.org/~jasonk/Data-Faker-0.07/lib/Data/Faker.pm

Installing K3-Faker

  • Drop the source in your MODPATH folder.
  • Add the module to Kohana::modules in your bootstrap.php

Using K3-Faker

Use the static methods in Faker: 

echo 'Name: ' . Faker::name();

Output: 

Name: Abbigail Vandervort
